abstract: The fast food purveyor, which has been increasing its focus on China and other fast-growing foreign countries, is selling the pair of domestic-focused businesses.
snippet: The fast food purveyor, which has been increasing its focus on China and other fast-growing foreign countries, is selling the pair of domestic-focused businesses.
lead_paragraph: Yum Brands, which has been prospering abroad, announced on Monday that it planned to sell a pair of domestic-focused businesses, Long John Silver’s and A&W All-American Food.

headline.main: Yum Puts Long John Silver’s and A&W on the Block
